### About

I am first-year PhD student at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, training to become a health economist. My research interests include health economics, health services research, population health, and political economy. Before graduate school, I worked for AmeriHealth Caritas Family of Companies as an Analyst for Healthcare Plan Analytics.

### Education

      Ithaca College - Ithaca, New York

            *BA in Economics & BS in Public and Community Health, 2022*

      Johns Hopkins University - Baltimore, Maryland

            *PhD in Health Economics & Policy, 2027 (expected)*
